description.english: Cure your first Humbie level 1
description.french: Soignez votre premier hominizombus niveau 1.
description.italian: Cura il tuo primo zombumano di livello 1!
description.spanish: Cura a tu primer humbi de nivel 1.
description.schinese: 治愈您的第一个等级1人类僵尸
description.brazilian: Cure o primeiro zumano de nível 1!

description.spanish: Cura a tu primer humano.
description.brazilian: Cure o primeiro humano!
description.italian: Cura il tuo primo umano!

description.english: Research Tier II for the first time
description.french: Faites une recherche de grade II pour la première fois.
description.spanish: Investiga el nivel II por primera vez.
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy opracuj II stopień zaawansowania.
description.brazilian: Pesquise o nível II pela primeira vez.
description.italian: Ricerca la classe II per la prima volta.

description.english: Research Tier III for the first time
description.french: Faites une recherche de grade III pour la première fois.

description.polish: Po raz pierwszy opracuj III stopień zaawansowania.
description.brazilian: Pesquise o nível III pela primeira vez.

description.english: Research Tier IV for the first time

description.brazilian: Pesquise o nível IV pela primeira vez.
description.italian: Ricerca la classe IV per la prima volta.

description.english: Send away a total of 20 cured humans
description.french: Renvoyez 20 humains guéris au total.
description.italian: Manda via 20 umani curati in totale.
description.spanish: Despacha a un total de 20 humanos curados.
description.schinese: 送走共计20个治愈的人类
description.brazilian: Envie um total de 20 humanos curados.

description.brazilian: Envie um total de 100 humanos curados.

description.spanish: Despacha a un total de 500 humanos curados.
description.schinese: 送走共计500个治愈的人类
description.brazilian: Envie um total de 500 humanos curados.

description.english: Get a total of 30 workers.
description.spanish: Consigue un total de 30 trabajadores.
description.brazilian: Tenha um total de 30 trabalhadores.
description.french: Comptabilisez 30 travailleurs au total.
description.italian: Raggiungi un totale di 30 lavoratori.

description.english: Get a total of 100 workers.
description.spanish: Consigue un total de 100 trabajadores.

description.french: Comptabilisez 1 000 travailleurs au total.

description.english: You have survived for 1 night.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido 1 noche.
description.brazilian: Você sobreviveu por 1 noite.
description.french: Vous avez survécu pendant 1 nuit.
description.italian: Ce l'hai fatta a sopravvivere per 1 notte.

description.english: You have survived for 10 nights.
description.italian: Ce l'hai fatta a sopravvivere per 10 notti.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido 10 noches.
description.brazilian: Você sobreviveu por 10 noites.
description.french: Vous avez survécu pendant 10 nuits.

description.english: You have survived for 25 nights.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido 25 noches.

description.english: Get everything out of old objects that is laying around on a single map.
description.italian: Recupera tutto il possibile da vecchi oggetti sparsi su una mappa.
description.spanish: Saca el máximo provecho a los objetos viejos que haya desparramados por un mapa.
description.schinese: 从散落在一张地图上各处的旧物体中取走所有东西。
description.russian: Получите все возможное из старых объектов, раскиданных по одной карте.
description.polish: Pozyskaj wszystko ze starych obiektów rozrzuconych na jednej mapie.
description.brazilian: Pegue tudo dos objetos antigos que estão espalhados em um único mapa.
description.german: Hole auf einer Karte alle Ressourcen aus alten Ruinen und anderen Überbleibseln
description.french: Récupérez tous les vieux objets pouvant être trouvés sur une carte.

description.english: Spend 10.000 metal on build structures
description.italian: Spendi 10.000 in metallo costruendo strutture.
description.spanish: Gasta 10 000 de metal en construir edificios.
description.russian: Потратьте 10 000 ед. металла на строительство сооружений.
description.brazilian: Gaste 10.000 de metal para construir estruturas.
description.german: Gib 10.000 Metall für den Bau von Objekten aus.
description.french: Dépensez 10 000 unités de métal pour construire des bâtiments.

description.english: Build 10 objects.
description.spanish: Construye 10 objetos.
description.brazilian: Construa 10 objetos.
description.french: Fabriquez 10 objets.
description.italian: Costruisci 10 oggetti.

description.spanish: Construye 40 objetos.

description.english: One Humbie has trained with a training device.
description.italian: Addestra uno zombumano con un dispositivo di addestramento.
description.spanish: Un humbi ha entrenado con una máquina de entrenamiento.
description.schinese: 1个人类僵尸通过一个训练设备进行了训练。
description.russian: Чомби потренировался с устройством для тренировки.
description.brazilian: Um zumano treinou com um dispositivo de treino.
description.german: Ein Humbie hat an einem Trainingsgerät trainiert.
description.french: Un hominizombus s'est entraîné avec un appareil d'entraînement.

description.french: 30 hominizombus se sont entraînés avec un appareil d'entraînement.

description.english: Finish the tutorial
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel.
description.italian: Finisci il tutorial.
description.spanish: Termina el tutorial.
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.

description.english: Cure a Zombie in the third night
description.french: Soignez un zombie lors de la troisième nuit.
description.spanish: Cura un zombi a la tercera noche.
description.schinese: 在第三个夜晚治愈一个僵尸
description.brazilian: Cure um zumbi na terceira noite.
description.german: Behandle einen Zombie in oder vor der dritten Nacht.
description.italian: Cura uno zombi la terza notte.

description.english: Let workers dropÂ 100 resources
description.italian: Fai cadere 100 risorse ai lavoratori.
description.spanish: Haz que los trabajadores se dejen caer 100 recursos.
description.brazilian: Permita que os funcionários deixem cair 100 recursos.
description.german: Deine Arbeiter haben 100 Ressourcen fallen lassen.
description.french: Laissez vos travailleurs faire tomber 100 ressources.

description.english: Let workers drop 1000 resources
description.french: Laissez vos travailleurs faire tomber 1 000 ressources.
description.spanish: Haz que los trabajadores se dejen caer 1000 recursos.
description.brazilian: Permita que os funcionários deixem cair 1.000 recursos.
description.german: Deine Arbeiter haben 1000 Ressourcen fallen lassen.
description.italian: Fai cadere 1.000 risorse ai lavoratori.

description.english: Let workers drop 10.000 resources
description.italian: Fai cadere 10.000 risorse ai lavoratori.
description.spanish: Haz que los trabajadores se dejen caer 10 000 recursos.
description.brazilian: Permita que os funcionários deixem cair 10.000 recursos.
description.german: Deine Arbeiter haben 10.000 Ressourcen fallen lassen.
description.french: Laissez vos travailleurs faire tomber 10 000 ressources.

description.english: 100 workers turned into zombies
description.spanish: 100 trabajadores se han convertido en zombis.
description.brazilian: 100 trabalhadores transformados em zumbis.
description.german: 100 deiner Arbeiter wurden in Zombies verwandelt.
description.french: 100 travailleurs se sont transformés en zombies.
description.italian: 100 lavoratori trasformati in zombi.

description.english: All your workers died
description.french: Tous vos travailleurs sont morts.
description.italian: Fai morire tutti i tuoi lavoratori.
description.spanish: Todos tus trabajadores han muerto.
description.brazilian: Todos os seus trabalhadores morreram.

description.english: Press the Lockdown Button in a night without zombies
description.spanish: Pulsa el botón de confinamiento en una noche sin zombis.
description.schinese: 在一个没有僵尸的晚上点击封锁按钮
description.russian: Нажмите кнопку изоляции в ночь без зомби.
description.polish: Wduś przycisk zamknięcia w noc bez zombie.
description.brazilian: Aperte o botão de confinamento em uma noite sem zumbis.
description.german: Aktiviere die Ausgangssperre in einer Nacht ohne Zombies.
description.french: Appuyez sur le bouton Confinement lors d'une nuit sans zombies.
description.italian: Premi il pulsante di quarantena in una notte senza zombi.

description.english: Let all your scientists be sad at once.
description.spanish: Permite que todos tus científicos estén tristes a la vez.
description.polish: Pozwól wszystkim naukowcom jednocześnie pogrążyć się w rozpaczy.
description.brazilian: Todos os seus cientistas ficaram tristes ao mesmo tempo.
description.german: Lass alle deine Wissenschaftler zur selben Zeit traurig werden.
description.french: Laissez tous vos scientifiques être tristes en même temps.
description.italian: Fai diventare tristi tutti i tuoi scienziati contemporaneamente.

description.english: Have 10 angry Humbies at once
description.italian: Fai infuriare 10 zombumani contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Ten a 10 humbis malhumorados a la vez.
description.schinese: 让10个人类僵尸同时发怒
description.russian: Добейтесь, чтобы у вас было 10 злых чомби за раз.
description.brazilian: Tenha 10 zumanos furiosos ao mesmo tempo.
description.german: Habe 10 wütende Humbies gleichzeitig in deinem Labor.
description.french: Retrouvez-vous avec 10 hominizombus en colère en même temps.

displayName.polish: A niech to! Za późno! I
displayName.german: Verflixt! Du warst zu langsam! I

description.english: Let 10 zombies in total melt again before you are able to treat them into humbies.
description.italian: Lascia scongelare 10 zombi in totale prima di riuscire a trasformarli in zombumani.
description.spanish: Deja que 10 zombis en total se descongelen antes de tratarlos y convertirlos en humbis.
description.schinese: 让共计10个僵尸再次融化，之后才能治愈他们，使他们变回人类僵尸。
description.russian: Дайте 10 зомби вновь расплавиться прежде, чем вы успеете превратить их в чомби.
description.polish: Pozwól stopić się 10 zombie, zanim zdążysz wyleczyć ich do stanu człombie.
description.brazilian: Deixe 10 zumbis derreterem novamente antes de conseguir transformá-los em zumanos.
description.german: Lass insgesamt 10 Zombies auftauen bevor du sie zu Humbies behandelt hast.
description.french: Laissez fondre un total de 10 zombies avant d'avoir pu les transformer en hominizombus.

displayName.polish: A niech to! Za późno! II
displayName.german: Verflixt! Du warst zu langsam! II

description.english: Let 100 zombies in total melt again before you are able to treat them into humbies.
description.italian: Lascia scongelare 100 zombi in totale prima di riuscire a trasformarli in zombumani.

description.french: Laissez fondre un total de 100 zombies avant d'avoir pu les transformer en hominizombus.

displayName.polish: A niech to! Za późno! III
displayName.german: Verflixt! Du warst zu langsam! III

description.english: Let 1000 zombies in total melt again before you are able to treat them into humbies.
description.french: Laissez fondre un total de 1 000 zombies avant d'avoir pu les transformer en hominizombus.
description.italian: Lascia scongelare 1000 zombi in totale prima di riuscire a trasformarli in zombumani.
description.spanish: Deja que 1000 zombis en total se descongelen antes de tratarlos y convertirlos en humbis.
description.schinese: 让共计1000个僵尸再次融化，之后才能治愈他们，使他们变回人类僵尸。
description.russian: Дайте 1000 зомби вновь расплавиться прежде, чем вы успеете превратить их в чомби.

description.brazilian: Deixe 1.000 zumbis derreterem novamente antes de conseguir transformá-los em zumanos.
description.german: Lass insgesamt 1000 Zombies auftauen bevor du sie zu Humbies behandelt hast.

description.english: Let workers eat 1000 Super Food
description.french: Laissez vos travailleurs manger 1 000 superaliments.
description.italian: Fai mangiare 1.000 unità di supercibo ai lavoratori.
description.spanish: Deja que los trabajadores coman 1000 superalimentos.
description.brazilian: 1.000 trabalhadores comeram o superalimento.

description.english: Maintain a power network that consists of 100 amount of power poles.
description.french: Entretenez un réseau électrique comprenant 100 poteaux électriques.
description.spanish: Mantén una red eléctrica que cuente con 100 postes eléctricos.
description.schinese: 维持一个由100根电线杆组成的电力网络。
description.polish: Stwórz sieć energetyczną, która składa się ze 100 słupów energetycznych.
description.brazilian: Mantenha uma rede de energia que consiste em 100 postes de energia.
description.german: Baue einen Stromkreis der aus 100 Strommasten besteht.
description.italian: Mantieni una rete elettrica composta da 100 tralicci.

description.english: Run 20 Guard Stations in your lab
description.french: Ayez 20 armureries de garde dans votre laboratoire.
description.italian: Piazza 20 armerie dei guardiani nel tuo laboratorio.
description.spanish: Administra 20 arsenales de los guardias en tu laboratorio.
description.schinese: 在您的实验室运行20个守卫站
description.brazilian: Tenha 20 arsenais de guarda no seu laboratório.

description.english: Harvest all existing glowberry bushes on a single map.
description.french: Récoltez tous les buissons de phosphobaies existants sur une carte.
description.spanish: Extrae todas las luminobayas de los arbustos de luminobayas de un mapa.
description.schinese: 采收一张地图上现有的所有发光浆果。
description.russian: Соберите всю светнику на одной карте.
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie owoce z krzewów błyskawek na jednej mapie.
description.brazilian: Faça a colheita de todos os arbustos brilhantes em um mapa.
description.german: Ernte alle Glimmerbeerenbüsche auf einer Karte.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli alberi di brillabacche esistenti in una mappa.

description.english: Have 30 frozen zombies at the same time.
description.french: Retrouvez-vous avec un total 30 zombies gelés en même temps.
description.italian: Accumula 30 zombi congelati contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Ten a 30 zombis congelados a la vez.
description.polish: Utrzymaj 30 zamrożonych zombie w tym samym czasie.
description.brazilian: Tenha 30 zumbis congelados ao mesmo tempo.

displayName.french: Couper le mal à la racine

description.english: Clear all vegetables on a single map
description.french: Récoltez tous les légumes sur une carte.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le verdure in una mappa.
description.spanish: Extrae todas las verduras de un mapa.
description.schinese: 清空一张地图上的所有蔬菜
description.russian: Соберите все овощи на одной карте.
description.polish: Wyczyść jedną mapę ze wszystkich warzyw.
description.brazilian: Pegue todos os legumes em um mapa.
description.german: Ernte alle wilden Gemüsepflanzen auf einer Karte.
